replies.txt_content:
ID冲突的话下载IDFIX可以解决
1.6.4链接：http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-mods/1291014-1-6-4-smp-forge-idfix-and-idfix-minus-mods-for#entry23775606

求采纳！
